AnswerUnits

public struct AnswerUnits: JSONDecodable

Answer Units

Answer Units are a format that can be used with other Watson services, such as the Watson Retrieve and Rank Service

  • id

    an Id for the unit

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let id: String?
  • type

    type of the unit

    Declaration

    Swift

    Id of the parent, should the unit have one

    title of the current unit

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let title: String?
  • direction

    the direction the current unit is read (left to right, etc)
